name: Paint Ball
description:
Move the ball in any direction, and it leaves a trail of paint. Try to paint the whole floor! 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move the ball

ESC to pause the game

Credits:

Programming: Max Mitchell

Music/Audio: Michelle Gee

3D Textures: Ben Bortner

2D Art: Carina Ye, Lisa Nagahama

Developed for COMP23 Game Design at Tufts University
